div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1038 Dzhumati environs, Makharadze (518) raion, Georgia, 1910? Burial: before 325 B.C. (Golenko, Kapa- nadze) Contents: c. 40 AR. Colchis: hemidr. (all with ΜΟ) Disposition: Leningrad 2; Tiflis 1 † Pakhomov I, 11 Vasmer, 15 Zograph, "Nakhodky," 34
